query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `menuItems` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `eventId` int NOT NULL,
  `course` enum('starter','main','dessert') NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `isAvailable` boolean DEFAULT true NOT NULL,
  `orderIndex` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2PMnkMFrZnXtRMs.8c3e75715602 --database CmoCN8ea9H2wev4kGq2LWy --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `menuItems` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `eventId` int NOT NULL,
  `course` enum('starter','main','dessert') NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `isAvailable` boolean DEFAULT true NOT NULL,
  `orderIndex` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
